update t_policy
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cards = #{cards,jdbcType=CHAR},
categories = #{categories,jdbcType=CHAR},
educations = #{educations,jdbcType=CHAR},
titles = #{titles,jdbcType=CHAR},

times = #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER},

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
p_tId = #{pTid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

if_social_security = #{ifSocialSecurity,jdbcType=TINYINT},
social_area = #{socialArea,jdbcType=TINYINT},
social_times = #{socialTimes,jdbcType=TINYINT},
social_unit = #{socialUnit,jdbcType=TINYINT},
up_down = #{upDown,jdbcType=TINYINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where policy_id = #{policyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_policy set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cards = #{cards,jdbcType=CHAR}, categories = #{categories,jdbcType=CHAR}, educations = #{educations,jdbcType=CHAR}, titles = #{titles,jdbcType=CHAR}, qualities = #{qualities,jdbcType=CHAR}, honour_ids = #{honourIds,jdbcType=CHAR}, apply = #{apply,jdbcType=TINYINT}, color = #{color,jdbcType=CHAR}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, times = #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bank = #{bank,jdbcType=TINYINT}, annex = #{annex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, annex_info = #{annexInfo,jdbcType=CHAR}, apply_form = #{applyForm,jdbcType=CHAR}, funds = #{funds,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT}, p_tId = #{pTid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, funds_form = #{fundsForm,jdbcType=TINYINT}, declaration_target = #{declarationTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apply_materials = #{applyMaterials,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bonus = #{bonus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_process = #{businessProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, if_social_security = #{ifSocialSecurity,jdbcType=TINYINT}, social_area = #{socialArea,jdbcType=TINYINT}, social_times = #{socialTimes,jdbcType=TINYINT}, social_unit = #{socialUnit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, up_down = #{upDown,jdbcType=TINYINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where policy_id = #{policyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT tb.num,tb.`name` FROM `t_bank` tb LEFT JOIN t_policy_apply pa ON tb.pa_id = pa.pa_id LEFT JOIN t_talent t ON pa.talent_id = t.talent_id WHERE open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY tb.bank_id DESC
mapper.insert: insert into t_policy (policy_id, `name`, num, description, cards, categories, educations, titles, qualities, honour_ids, apply, color, rate, unit, times, bank, annex, annex_info, apply_form, funds, user_id, create_time, dr, p_tId, role_id, funds_form, declaration_target, start_time, end_time, apply_materials, bonus, business_process, phone, if_social_security, social_area, social_times, social_unit, up_down, update_time ) values (#{policyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cards,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{categories,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{educations,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{titles,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{qualities,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{honourIds,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{apply,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{color,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bank,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{annex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{annexInfo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{applyForm,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{funds,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{pTid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fundsForm,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{declarationTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyMaterials,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bonus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifSocialSecurity,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{socialArea,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{socialTimes,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{socialUnit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{upDown,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select approval.create_time as createTime, p.name as name, p.num as num, u.name as userName, pa.status as result, approval.opinion as opinion, approval.update_time as updateTime from t_policy p left join t_policy_apply pa on p.policy_id = pa.policy_id left join t_policy_approval approval on pa.policy_approval_id = approval.approval_id left join t_user u on approval.user_id = u.user_id where pa.talent_id = #{talentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and pa.status = 1

select
from t_policy where dr = 1 and up_down = 1
